Headline: #75 74th-75th Temporary Reroute at 75th/Paxton
ShortDescription: 75 74th-75th buses are temporarily rerouted via 75th, Jeffrey, 76th, Yates and 75th due to, street blockage near 75th/Paxton.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#75 74th-75th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 75th, Jeffrey, 76th, Yates and 75th due to, street blockage near 75th/Paxton.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Howard-bound Red Line Delays
ShortDescription: Howard-bound Red Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier police activity at 79th. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Howard-bound Red Line trains are running with residual delays following earlier police activity at 79th. 

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
